Object.name: MCCombobox4
Object.Property: SELECT * FROM dbo.SysCode WHERE TypeID='PmtState' ORDER BY Remark

Object.name: MCCombobox3
Object.Property: SELECT * FROM dbo.SysCode WHERE TypeID='PmtType' ORDER BY Remark

Object.name: MCCombobox1
Object.Property: SELECT '' AS ObjID,'---请选择---' AS ShowName UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),ObjID) AS ObjID,RecipeName+'['+RecipeMaterialCode+']' AS ShowName FROM dbo.PmtRecipe WHERE 1=1
SELECT '' AS ObjID,'---请选择---' AS ShowName UNION ALL SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(100),ObjID) AS ObjID,RecipeName+'['+RecipeMaterialCode+']' AS ShowName FROM dbo.PmtRecipe WHERE 1=1
